Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.name: stateTransitionDuration(isAppearing:)
Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.abstract: Returns the animation duration for a state transition of this view controller.

Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.name: stateTransitionWillBegin(isAppearing:)
Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.abstract: Notifies that a state transition will begin for this view controller.

Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.name: stateTransitionDidEnd(isAppearing:)
Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.abstract: Notifies that a state transition did end for this view controller.

Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.name: animateAlongsideStateTransition(isAppearing:)
Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.abstract: Animations performed alongside the state transition of this view controller.

Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.name: stateTransitionDelay(isAppearing:)
Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.abstract: Returns the animation delay for a state transition of the provided view controller.

Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.name: StateViewControllerTransitioning
Protocols/StateViewControllerTransitioni.abstract: View controllers can conform to this protocol to provide their desired

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/state.name: stateViewControllerDidChangeViewHierarchy
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/state.abstract: Notification name that fires when a state view controller updates its view hierarchy

Classes/StateViewController.html#/isTran.name: isTransitioningBetweenStates
Classes/StateViewController.html#/isTran.abstract: Indicates whether the view controller currently is transitioning between states.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/curren.name: currentState
Classes/StateViewController.html#/curren.abstract: Indicates the current state, or invokes loadAppearanceState() is a current state transition has not

Classes/StateViewController.html#/hasDet.name: hasDeterminedState
Classes/StateViewController.html#/hasDet.abstract: Indicates whether the state of this view controller has been determined.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/loadAp.name: loadAppearanceState()
Classes/StateViewController.html#/loadAp.abstract: Loads a state that should represent this view controller immediately as this view controller

Classes/StateViewController.html#/setNee.name: setNeedsStateTransition(to:animated:)
Classes/StateViewController.html#/setNee.abstract: Notifies the state view controller that a new state is needed.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/childr.name: children(for:)
Classes/StateViewController.html#/childr.abstract: Returns an array of content view controllers representing a state.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/childC.name: childContainerView
Classes/StateViewController.html#/childC.abstract: Container view placed directly in the StateViewControllers view.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/willTr.name: willTransition(to:animated:)
Classes/StateViewController.html#/willTr.abstract: Notifies the view controller that a state transition is to be performed.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/didTra.name: didTransition(from:animated:)
Classes/StateViewController.html#/didTra.abstract: Notifies the view controller that it has finished transitioning to a new state.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/childW.abstract: Notifies the view controller that a content view controller will appear.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/childD.name: childDidAppear(_:animated:)
Classes/StateViewController.html#/childD.abstract: Notifies the view controller that a content view controller did appear.

Classes/StateViewController.html#/childW.name: childWillDisappear(_:animated:)

Classes/StateViewController.html#/childD.abstract: Notifies the view controller that a content view controller did disappear.

Classes/StateViewController.html.name: StateViewController
Classes/StateViewController.html.abstract: A container view controller that manages the appearance of one or more child view controller for any given state.
